quote_first: “Yes.” Perena’s firm tone brooked no argument. “It exploded at 11:07. You would have entered at
quote_last: , so that by then you would have been exactly midway between the Gates.”
title: The Shadow and Night
author: Chris Walley

quote_first: I ended the call. I looked in Recents to make sure I HAD called. His number was there, along with the time -
quote_last: I turned off my phone and put it on the night table. I turned off my lamp and was asleep almost at once.
title: If It Bleeds
author: Stephen King
